io.codecastle.scriptorium.scribe

Class Whitespace

  • Object
    • Whitespace

  • public class Whitespace
extends Object
    Outputs whitespace characters to an Appendable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Whitespace(Appendable appendable)
      Constructs a new Whitespace instance that outputs whitespace to the provided Appendable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Whitespace newline()
      Outputs a single newline character and returns this object.
      Whitespace newlines(int count)
      Outputs the specified number of newline characters and returns this object.
      Whitespace space()
      Outputs a single space character and returns this object.
      Whitespace spaces(int count)
      Outputs the specified number of space characters and returns this object.
      Whitespace tab()
      Outputs a single tab character and returns this object.
      Whitespace tabs(int count)
      Outputs the specified number of tab characters and returns this object.
